name: Sigil of Summoning
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create a sigil on a surface within range that you can see. The sigil then serves as the center of a Summoning spell of lower tier than the tier this spell was cast at. If it has the Concentration tag, the sigil instead concentrates on the spell for you.

The sigil has AC 10 and 30 hit points, plus 15 per tier this spell is cast at. If destroyed, the spell ends. The surface the sigil is on cannot be destroyed or modified until the sigil is destroyed.

The first sigil is instantly destroyed if you cast this spell again.
